name: Lakitu's Great Adventure
summary: After saving Creamy Mami from the first adventure, Lakitu finally has a bit of a break… but not for long! Nidoking, on this tour, has kidnapped Shizuka and now Lakitu, along with a new reptilian friend, will venture to save the beautiful Shizuka from Nidoking’s poisonous hands. Lakitu’s Great Adventure is a fairly short hack, however it doesn’t seem to be easy. They are 9 super creative levels themed around something imaginative. Music, sprites, and even some enemies have been changed.
